alert.note: Alert for Osborne (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Hastings (North Central Kansas and South Central Nebraska)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 28 at 8:31PM CDT by NWS Hastings
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southern Osborne County through 915 PM CDT... At 831 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 11 miles southwest of Osborne to 6 miles east of Natoma. Movement was southeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. These storms will remain over mainly rural areas of southern Osborne County. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
